TEXT.TITLE: TEXAS INTERNATIONAL CO <TEI> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY:
Shr loss 36 cts vs loss 36 cts

    Avg shrs 55.8 mln vs 34.7 mln
    Year
